PRODUCT DETAILS

An investment leather piece that can be worn season after season, the AllSaints Cargo Leather Biker is your second skin. Crafted from premium lambskin, this slim-fitting piece is heavily garment washed and hand-burnished to create a two-tone effect. Wear it with plain jersey and skinny jeans.

  • Asymmetric fastening, zip pockets, quilted shoulders, dull nickel hardware
  • Slim fitting
  • 100% lambskin
  • Lining: 100% viscose
  • Specialist dry clean only
  • Model is 5'11" and wears a UK size 10

Delivery

AllSaints offers FREE Next Day Delivery on orders over £100.

Shop even later and receive your items the next day: order by 9pm for Next Day Delivery.

UK Standard Delivery: Free
Standard shipping time is 2 days (not including Sundays).

UK Next Day Delivery: £5.00, Free on orders over £100.
Order by 9pm.

UK Saturday Delivery: £5.00 Order by 9pm
Orders placed after 9pm Friday will be held and delivered the following Saturday.


Further Information

AllSaints offer free Returns on all UK orders, see our Returns page for all details.UK orders are delivered between the hours of 7:30am - 9pm.International delivery on orders over £250 are FREE for delivery within 5-7 days.

A signature is required for all deliveries. Please see Delivery page for more information on shipping restrictions.

Care Guide

  • Chlorine bleaching not possible
  • Regular dry cleaning
  • Do not tumble dry
  • Do not iron
  • Do not wash
